title: FireEyes
creator: Deque Systems Inc.
description: FireEyes is a Firefox plugin that integrates with Firebug and allows developers, QA engineers and subject matter experts to test individual and multiple pages for Section 508 and WCAG 2 accessibility issues. It has built-in color contrast analysis, screen reader simulation and support for DHTML pgs.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
assists: Modifying the presentation of web pages
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
reports: Exports issues to JIRA and HP ALM
